CustomField.formula: if( MONTH( Accounted_Date__c )=1,"January", If(MONTH( Accounted_Date__c)=2,"February", If(MONTH( Accounted_Date__c)=3,"March", If(MONTH( Accounted_Date__c)=4,"April", If(MONTH( Accounted_Date__c)=5,"May", If(MONTH( Accounted_Date__c)=6,"June", If(MONTH( Accounted_Date__c)=7,"July", If(MONTH( Accounted_Date__c)=8,"August", If(MONTH( Accounted_Date__c)=9,"September", If(MONTH( Accounted_Date__c)=10,"October", If(MONTH( Accounted_Date__c)=11,"November","December")))))))))))
CustomField.label: Month
